TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Salitung, title = Salitung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salitung} }

S.FORM: Salitung Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantou ko Salitung a niyaro', 268 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 777 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 51% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 394 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 49% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 383 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun48%, Tayal1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%.

Salitong Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantoo ko Salitong a niyaro', 268 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 777 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 51% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 394 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 49% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 383 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon48%, Tayal1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%.
